targets.expr: count(kube_pod_status_ready{condition="false",unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"}==1) by(namespace) - (count(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Succeeded",unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"}==1) by(namespace) or vector(0)) or count(kube_pod_status_ready{condition="false",unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"}==1) by(namespace)

sum(group(kube_node_labels{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"})by (node,label_alibabacloud_com_nodepool_id) * on (node) group_left() sum((max(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running",unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"}) by (pod) > 0) * on (pod) group_right() kube_pod_info * on (pod) group_left() (sum (kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"})by(pod)))by (node))by(label_alibabacloud_com_nodepool_id)

sum(group(kube_node_labels{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"})by (node,label_alibabacloud_com_nodepool_id) * on (node) group_left() sum(kube_pod_info * on (pod) group_left() (sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"}) by(pod) * on (pod) group_right() (max(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running",unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"}) by (pod) > 0)))by (node))by(label_alibabacloud_com_nodepool_id) / sum(group(kube_node_labels{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"})by (node,label_alibabacloud_com_nodepool_id) * on (node) group_left() sum(kube_node_status_capacity_memory_bytes{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"})by(node))by (label_alibabacloud_com_nodepool_id)

sum(group(kube_node_labels{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"})by (node,label_alibabacloud_com_nodepool_id) * on (node) group_left() sum((max(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running",unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"}) by (pod) > 0) * on (pod) group_right() kube_pod_info * on (pod) group_left() (sum (kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"})by(pod)))by (node))by(label_alibabacloud_com_nodepool_id) / sum(group(kube_node_labels{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"})by (node,label_alibabacloud_com_nodepool_id) * on (node) group_left() sum(kube_node_status_capacity_cpu_cores{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"})by(node))by (label_alibabacloud_com_nodepool_id)

sum(group(kube_node_labels{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"})by (node,label_alibabacloud_com_nodepool_id) * on (node) group_left() sum((max(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running",unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"}) by (pod) > 0) * on (pod) group_right() kube_pod_info * on (pod) group_left() (sum (kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"})by(pod)))by (node))by(label_alibabacloud_com_nodepool_id)

sum(group(kube_node_labels{unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"})by (node,label_alibabacloud_com_nodepool_id) * on (node) group_left() count((max(kube_pod_status_phase{phase!="Running",unique_cluster_name=~"$Cluster"}) by (pod,namespace,phase) > 0) * on (pod,namespace) group_right() group(kube_pod_info) by (pod,namespace,node)) by (node)) by (label_alibabacloud_com_nodepool_id)
